Contact

Reporting bugs

To report bugs please send a simple e-mail to the package maintainer: <Achim.Zeileis at R-project.org>

Discussions

For discussions we also try to follow these channels:

  • StackOverflow with standard-error and r tags (for questions about code/programming)
  • StackExchange with robust-standard-error and r tags (for questions about methods)
  • Twitter (include @AchimZeileis)
  • R-help mailing list
